Title: Dance Academy
Actors: Tara Morice, Alicia Banit, Dena Kaplan, Jordan Rodrigues, Tim Pocock, Tom Green, Xenia Goodwin
Plot: At Sydney's National Dance Academy, a few talented youngsters are recruited for the excruciatingly tough course. Jewish long line of doctors' heir Samuel 'Sammy' and minor juvenile offender Christian are the outsiders but gradually fit in, making new kinds of friends. Star ballerina's daughter Kat also introduces them in the circle of last-year brother Ethan, who already aspires a career as choreographer.
